import React from 'react' import {Container} from '../common/Container'; import Heading from '../common/Heading/Heading'; import data from './ContentForAboutUs' import { Flex, Section, ContentContainer, SectionTitle, SectionContent, SectionImg, Img, Image, ContentBlock, Text, ComponentContainer } from './StyledAboutUs'; export const AboutUsPage = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0) return (
About Us {data.map((item, i) => { const section = item; if (i % 2 === 0) { return (
{section.icon === null ? '' : }

{section.title}

{section.subtitle}

 {section.content}

{section.subcontent}
) } return (

{section.title}

 {section.content}

{section.subcontent}
) })}
) } export default AboutUsPage;
